translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter on Seeds
The Elder Sataraṁsi’s Birth Story
Having climbed up to the top of the mountain,
the most excellent of men sat down;
Not far from the mountain,
a brahmin who had mastered the mantras.🔽The great hero,
the god of gods, the bull among men,
having raised his hands in respectful salutation,
he consoled the leader of the world.
‘This is the Buddha, the great hero,
the expounder of the excellent Dhamma,
he shines like a mass of fire,

analyzed: bhikkhu saṅgha purakkhato  mahā samuddaḥ vakkhubbhaḥ  duruttaraḥ
translated: preceded by the Saṅgha of monks.🔽He is as unfathomable as the great ocean,🔽as difficult to cross as the waves,
the fearless king of deer,
the one with vision teaches the Dhamma.’
Knowing my thought,
the leader Padumuttara,
the Teacher, standing in the Saṅgha of monks,
recited these verses.
‘Because this respectful salutation was given,
and the best Buddha was praised,
for twenty-one thousand eons,
he will exercise rulership over the gods.
In a hundred thousand eons,
one named Aṅgīrasa,
the Fully Awakened One with the cloud of doubt removed,
will appear at that time.
He will be an heir to the Dhamma,
The Dhamma-image in my heart,
Will be named Sataraṁsi,
And will be a Worthy One.’
Seven years old when I was born,
I went forth into homelessness;
My name was Sataraṁsi,
And my radiance shone forth.
In a pavilion or at the foot of a tree,
I, a meditator, was devoted to meditation;
I bore my last body,
In the Dispensation of the Fully Awakened One.
In sixty-four thousand (years) there were four kings named Rāma,
Endowed with the seven treasures,
Powerful Universal Monarchs.
The four analytical insights,
I have done what the Buddha’s Dispensation requires.”🔽Thus the venerable Sataraṁsi recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā sataraṁsi thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Sataraṁsittherassāpadānaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā satarasi theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽satarasittherassa apadānam
translated: The Story of the Elder Sataraṁsi is the second.
